    • Constructor Detail

      • BallotScanner

        public BallotScanner()
        Equivalent to new BallotScanner(-1).

      • BallotScanner

        public BallotScanner(int serial)
        Constructs a new instance of a persistent ballot scanner. This implementation runs in the background, on an auditorium network.
        Parameters:
        serial - the serial number of the votebox

    • Method Detail

      • registerForActivated

        public void registerForActivated(java.util.Observer obs)
        Register to be notified when this BallotScanner's active status changes
        Parameters:
        obs - the observer

      • getStatus

        public BallotScannerEvent getStatus()
        Returns this booth's status as a VoteBoxEvent, used for periodic broadcasts
        Returns:
        the status

      • isActivated

        public boolean isActivated()
        Returns:
        whether this BallotScanner is active

      • setActivated

        public void setActivated(boolean activated)
        Sets this BallotScanner's active status
        Parameters:
        activated - the activated to set

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        whether this ballot scanner is connected to any machines

      • beginScanning

        public void beginScanning()

      • start

        public void start()
        Main method which right now just goes into an infinite while loop, constantly scanning

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main entry point into the program. If an argument is given, it will be the serial number, otherwise VoteBox will load a serial from its config file.
        Parameters:
        args - - arguments to be passed to the main method, from the command line
